seo.title: Contact Us - DEFFATEST Support
seo.description: Get in touch with DEFFATEST support team. We're here to help with questions, support, or partnership opportunities.

introText: Have questions about DEFFATEST, need support, or interested in a partnership? We're here to help!

emailSection.heading: Direct Email Support
emailSection.description: For immediate assistance or detailed inquiries, reach out to us directly via email. We typically respond within 24 hours.

tips.heading: What to include in your email:
items: Detailed description of your question or issue

formSection.heading: Send us a Message

fields.messagePlaceholder: Please provide as much detail as possible about your question or request...

success.title: Message sent successfully!
success.description: We'll get back to you shortly.

error.title: Failed to send message.
error.description: Please try again or contact us directly via email.
